skill.Name: Polearms
skill.Description: You are skilled with polearms, which do additional penetration while charging or lunging.

power.Name: Polearm Proficiency
power.Description: You get +2 to hit with polearms.

power.Name: Polearm Lunge
power.Description: You can lunge with polearms to attack opponents up to two spaces away.

power.Name: Polearm Repel
power.Description: Your attacks with polearms push enemies away from you.

power.Name: Polearm Double Grip
power.Description: You can weild polearms with two hands to deal additional damage.
